page.title: Help & FAQ
page.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about using {appName}

quickLinks.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to use the service

howToStart.question: How do I start using {appName}?
howToStart.answerStep3: You'll receive 10 free credits to try the service
howToStart.answerStep6: Upload an image (JPG, PNG, or WEBP format)
howToStart.answerStep8: Click "Enhance Image" and wait for processing

supportedFormats.question: What image formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answerIntro: We currently support the following image formats:
supportedFormats.format1: JPG/JPEG - Most common format for photos
supportedFormats.format2: PNG - Best for images with transparency or text
supportedFormats.format3: WEBP - Modern format with good compression
supportedFormats.maxFileSize: Maximum file size for free tier:

upscaleDifference.question: What is the difference between 2x and 4x upscaling?
upscaleDifference.2xDesc: Doubles the width and height of your image (4x total pixels). Best for moderate quality improvements.
upscaleDifference.4xDesc: Quadruples the width and height (16x total pixels). Best for significant enlargements or very small source images.
upscaleDifference.example: Example: A 500x500px image becomes 1000x1000px at 2x, or 2000x2000px at 4x.

processingTime.question: How long does image processing take?
processingTime.answer: Processing typically takes 30-60 seconds depending on image size and current server load. You'll see a progress indicator while your image is being enhanced.

whatAreCredits.question: What are credits?
whatAreCredits.answerPart1: Credits are the currency used for processing images. Each image enhancement consumes 1 credit, regardless of upscale factor.

purchaseCredits.question: How do I purchase more credits?
purchaseCredits.answerMid: to choose from our subscription plans:

creditsExpire.question: Do credits expire?
creditsExpire.answer: Subscription credits roll over month-to-month up to 6× your monthly credit allowance, as long as your subscription remains active. For example, the Hobby plan can accumulate up to 1,200 credits (6 × 200).

cancelSubscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancelSubscription.answerIntro: Yes! You can cancel anytime through:
cancelSubscription.answerOutro: You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period, and any remaining credits will stay in your account.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and various other payment methods through Stripe, our secure payment processor.

refunds.question: Can I get a refund?
refunds.answerIntro: Due to the nature of digital services, refunds are generally not provided for used credits. However, we may issue refunds at our discretion for:
refunds.reason1: Technical failures that result in lost credits

failedProcessing.question: My image failed to process. What should I do?
failedProcessing.step1: Your credit should be automatically refunded
failedProcessing.step2: Check that your image meets our requirements (format, size)
failedProcessing.step3: Try a different image to rule out file corruption
failedProcessing.step4: Clear your browser cache and try again

qualityIssues.question: The quality isn't what I expected. Why?
qualityIssues.answerIntro: AI enhancement works best with certain types of images:
qualityIssues.result1: Best results: Photos with clear subjects, product images, real estate photos
qualityIssues.result2: Good results: Graphics with text, logos, illustrations
qualityIssues.result3: Variable results: Very low-resolution images, heavily compressed images, abstract art
qualityIssues.answerOutro: The quality of your source image greatly affects the final result. Starting with a higher-quality source will produce better enhancements.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my data secure and private?
dataPrivacy.point1: Images are processed in real-time and not permanently stored
dataPrivacy.point2: We do not use your images to train AI models
dataPrivacy.point3: All data transmission is encrypted with HTTPS
dataPrivacy.point4: We comply with data protection regulations

commercialUse.question: Can I use enhanced images commercially?
commercialUse.answer: Yes! You retain all rights to your images. We do not claim any ownership of your uploaded or enhanced images. However, you must have the legal right to use the original image you upload. We are not responsible for copyright violations related to your source images.

browserSupport.question: What browsers are supported?
browserSupport.jsNote: JavaScript must be enabled for the service to function.

cta.title: Still need help?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
